title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, Appendices, app 45
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, Appendices, app 45

State Regulations

The purpose of these Appendixes is to simplify the task of
determining whether or not a proposed action will not have a significant effect
upon the environment by identifying actions or classes of actions that are
considered by the issuer to be exempt or ministerial actions and those which, in the judgement of the issuer, will not have a significant effect upon the
environment. Because of the complex and varied nature of the issuer's
actions, the lists in these Appendices are not all-inclusive. The omission from
the lists of an action does not mean that it is automatically an action
requiring environmental impact statement preparation. The criteria set forth in
6 NYCRR
617.9
and criteria included in 6 NYCRR
617.10
and this Part shall be
used to determine significance with respect to actions not listed in these

Appendices. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, Appendices, app
45

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
